mainEvent_y2: pause 500/playMusic ocean/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/loadActors MainEvent/addTemporaryActor Governor 16 32 24 9 2/warpFarmers 24 18 0 28 18 0 32 15 3 26 19 0 20 19 0 15 10 1 15 13 1 34 11 3 right 29 5 2/showFrame Maru 31/showFrame Penny 34/positionOffset Maru 8 24/positionOffset Penny 0 24/positionOffset Jodi 0 16/positionOffset Kent? 8 16/positionOffset Clint 0 -24/positionOffset Haley -8 12/viewport 24 11 true/pause 2000/faceDirection Lewis 3/pause 100/faceDirection Lewis 2/pause 100/faceDirection Lewis 1/pause 100/faceDirection Lewis 2/speak Lewis "Hello and welcome, everyone! I'm pleased to announce that the potluck ceremony has begun.#$b#I have high hopes that you all contributed high-quality ingredients! We want to leave the governor with a good impression, now."/pause 1000/faceDirection Lewis 3/pause 500/speak Lewis "Well... Governor? Would you indulge us with an honorary first tasting?"/pause 500/speak Governor "I would be delighted! I've been eyeing the soup all afternoon."/playMusic none/pause 500/move Governor 0 1 2/pause 1000/playSound dwop/showFrame Governor 8 true/pause 1000/animate Governor false false 200 8 8 9 10 11 11/pause 1100/playSound sipTea/pause 1000/playSound gulp/pause 500/showFrame Governor 8 true/animate Governor false false 200 11 10 9 8/pause 900/speak Governor "...$h"/pause 300/cutscene governorTaste/null
Governor: What a lovely occasion... It's always a joy to visit Stardew Valley.#$e#I must speak to the missus about purchasing a vacation home here.
Abigail_spouse: Don't let me stop you from having fun today. I just feel like watching the sea by myself.
Leah_spouse: It's nice to see everyone once in a while, but mostly I want to get back to the farm.
Maru_spouse: Harvey keeps trying to talk to me, but all I want is a piece of this roast.
Penny_spouse: I'm just humoring some old friends. What I really want is a bowl of that soup.
Haley_spouse: Phew... I'm afraid to move, or else I might start to sweat.
Sebastian_spouse: I'm doing my best to stay in a good mood...
Sam_spouse: I guess it wouldn't be very nice to put something nasty in the soup...
Alex_spouse: Hey, I'll take any excuse to come hang out at the beach. This weather is amazing!
Harvey_spouse: Oh dear... I've got sand in my socks...$s
Elliott_spouse: The old cabin seems to be holding up well. Every time I return I half expect the thing to be rotted...
Abigail: It's tiring to socialize with everyone... I'd rather watch the sea.
Robin: Ow... you stepped on my foot, dear.
Demetrius: This is tiring, honey. Are you ready to visit the buffet soon? *pant*
Maru: Whatever Linus is roasting smells awfully good... *slurp*
Sebastian: One year Sam put a pound of anchovies in the potluck soup.#$e#Ever wondered why Sam leads the town in community service hours?$h
Linus: A slow, continuous rotation is key to achieving the perfect roast.
Pierre: Hmm... maybe if I get on the governor's good side he'll give my business a tax break...#$b#I wonder if he likes aged whiskey?#$e#Now if only the Mayor would stop shmoozing with him all afternoon.
Caroline: I put fresh vegetables from my garden into the communal soup pot.
Alex: Perfect weather for a beach party, huh?
George: That music! It's too loud.#$b#Can't I have a little peace and quiet to enjoy the ocean?
Evelyn: Ahh... The smell of the ocean takes me back many years. Long before you were born.
Lewis: Look sharp! The governor's here for his annual visit.#$b#If you brought something for the potluck make sure and add it to the soup cauldron.
Clint: I'm full, but what else is there to do besides eat?
Penny: We do this festival every year to give the governor a taste of everything the valley has to offer.#$e#Mayor Lewis hopes it will get the governor on our good side. That's why he's so neurotic about the way the soup tastes.
Pam: Heh... free buffet. One of the perks of living here. Enjoy it, kid!
Haley: I would dance, but I don't want to get sweaty.
Jodi: I hope the soup is good this year.
Marlon: I'll be back here by the trees... the air is a lot cooler.
Sam: Governor? Who cares...#$e#Why should I care about some random old guy?
Leah: How's the farming coming along? It must be a busy season for you.
Shane: Wow... you don't get hot pepper chutney like this in the big city...
Marnie: If you brought something for the soup, climb the stairs on the other side and throw it in.
Elliott: I woke up late, stepped out of the door and found myself in the middle of all this hubbub!#$e#I forgot that today was the Luau.$h
Gus: These blasted sand-flies keep landing on the food!
Dwarf: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*#$e#Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
Wizard: The merpeople are curious about your festivities.#$e#They become upset when you litter into the ocean.
Harvey: Good thing I came with sunscreen.#$e#I wonder if Maru could use some sunscreen on her shoulders?
Sandy: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?$h#$e#I kind of miss the rain, actually...$s
Willy: Hi there, @. Taking a breather?#$e#To tell you the truth, I'd rather be fishing right now.
Leo: Shhh... I'm learning the secrets of the perfect roast.
Governor_y2: I eagerly anticipate my visit to Stardew Valley each year. There's a palpable charm in the air!
Abigail_spouse_y2: After the soup tasting, let's go hang out on the docks away from everyone.$0
Penny_spouse_y2: I heard a rumor that the governor is considering buying a vacation home here.$0
Leah_spouse_y2: You better grab a plate before it's all gone!$1
Haley_spouse_y2: I'm tempted to run back home and grab my bikini.$0#$b#The water's at a perfect temperature... I dipped my little toe in!$1
Maru_spouse_y2: It's cooler back here in the shade. I'll join you at the buffet soon, okay?$0
Emily_spouse_y2: *pant* It might be time to take a break soon.$0#$e#We should dance together later, okay?$1
Harvey_spouse_y2: This music is making my legs move on their own... just like aerobics class!$0
Alex_spouse_y2: Today... I eat as much as I want. I'll do extra push-ups tomorrow!$0
Sam_spouse_y2: That soup is smelling zesty...#$e#Did you add something good? I'm getting hungry!$1
Sebastian_spouse_y2: Do you remember when you caught me in this spot on that rainy day?$0#$e#Even though this is my solo spot... I was really glad you came.$1
Elliott_spouse_y2: I would suggest we make time for a little 'rendezvous' in my old cabin... but I'm afraid it's become rather... musty... in my absence.
Abigail_y2: My dad's obsessed with the governor's visit. Everything has to be perfect!#$e#I think he's hoping to be mayor some day...$9
Demetrius_y2: Why do humans enjoy dancing? Perhaps it is an instinctual mechanism, so that we will inadvertently convey our genetic quality to potential mates?%noturn
Maru_y2: Ow... this bench has been cooking in the sun all day.$2
Sebastian_y2: Oh, hey. Looking to escape the noise too?$0
Linus_y2: Ah, can you smell that?$0#$b#It's a signal that the roast is almost ready!$1
Pierre_y2: The moment Lewis steps away from the governor... that's my moment to rub elbows...$0#$e#Ah, I didn't see you there.$4#$e#If you want to buy something, talk to me on the other side of the counter.$1
Caroline_y2: Gus used my potatoes to make several dishes for the buffet.$0#$e#So, what kind of ingredient are you adding to the soup?$0
Alex_y2: Do you think if I went in the water, other people would follow? I don't want to be a solo swimmer!$0
George_y2: Leek and garlic mashed potatoes? Hehe... honey, I think I've died and gone to heaven!%noturn$1
Evelyn_y2: Now, don't overeat dear. I wouldn't want you getting a stomach ache.%noturn$0
Lewis_y2: The governor is our distinguished guest today! I expect all of you to be on your best behavior.#$b#For those who brought something for the potluck, contribute your ingredients to the soup cauldron.
Clint_y2: *munch* This festival always has the best food.
Penny_y2: Isn't it wonderful to see our community come together like this? I try my best to treasure these moments.$0
Pam_y2: *slurp* Oh, yeah! I'm gonna need more of this!$1
Emily_y2: *pant* It's all in the hips!$0#$e#I think I need to take a break soon. I'm getting sweaty!$0
Haley_y2: Don't block the sun! I'm in just the right spot to avoid getting any tan lines.$0
Jodi_y2: I've heard the summer season gets very busy for farmers. Make sure you don't overwork yourself!$0
Kent_y2: *sniff* ...smells are powerful for bringing back memories...$0#$e#That can be good or bad...
Marlon_y2: Hello.#$e#Soup? Dancing? No thank you. I'm perfectly content right here. Besides, someone needs to keep watch in case a monster appears...$0
Sam_y2: Next year, I gotta remember to bring my electric guitar... Imagine a solo at this part of the song!$0
Leah_y2: I can't seem to decide what to eat! There's too many options to choose from.$0
Shane_y2: I'll never turn down free food.
Marnie_y2: Hello, @! Did you bring an ingredient for the potluck? Just climb the stairs and toss it right in!$1
Elliott_y2: Ah, the Luau... all the hustle and bustle of town brought to my very doorstep!$0
Gus_y2: One bad ingredient can ruin the whole soup...$0
Dwarf_y2: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*#$e#Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it.
Wizard_y2: In the dark depths of the sea lie many mysteries, waiting to be uncovered.$0
Harvey_y2: *pant*... *pant*... ahhhh, I can't wait for a bowl of piping hot soup...$h
Sandy_y2: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?$h#$e#I kind of miss the rain, actually...$s
Jas_y2: B...But... Do I have to eat it?$2
Vincent_y2: Why can't I go play by the tide pools?$s
Willy_y2: Don't worry, I'll be back for the soup... I'm just enjoying a tender moment with me pipe!$3
Leo_y2: My home is that way, across the ocean. It feels so close, but so far away.$0#$e#I hope my friends are doing well.$0
